I loved the suit and it fit perfectly.  I thought I had the problem solved as to what to wear to my grandson's wedding, but no way could I get the wrinkles out.So disappointed!  I am thinking of calling dry cleaners and see if they can steam out wrinkles.  If they can, I will probably reorder!

Looks beautiful and very comfortable. Perfect for my daughters wedding.
Did not fit or look right on me

The color was perfect although not a true dark navy but to me it was a very pretty shade.  I also could not have been more surprised with the amount of compliments I received at the weddng reception I attended.  People stopped me even in the restroom to tell me how pretty my outfit was.  It fit well and was very comfortable to wear.  There was no issue with the lace being scratchy and many really liked the "sparkle" and I also was happy with the higher straight across front on the shell. This outfit needed no jewelry and I am considering buying this in another shade. Backstory is that I shopped for weeks to find something for the event and it was  literally a last minute decision when I decided to take a chance and order this outfit. Fit and pant length was perfect so alterations were not needed.Note that the pant width is a little wider than I prefer but after taking it to the dry cleaner to be pressed they were fine. Interesting to note that outfits I have purchased or had made at a sigificantly higher cost had not received the amount of compliments that this one did.

This beautiful pantsuit was great on my 93 year old mother in-law. She looked fabulous and was comfortable. Very well made.What was most  important was She loved it! I did have to hem the pants because she is only 5’1”

评论概述: A stunning pantsuit for an evening out!
评论详情: I purchased this outfit for a formal wedding in California. The sequins in the top look both beautiful and elegant. It was very comfortable, but a bit too long through the torso. I'm very short waisted and only 5'1", so the top didn't sit properly on me. It is very lovely and would look well on someone a bit taller. I'd have loved to have worn it,but ended up not going due to illness anyway! It is definitely worth the money as you could wear it to less formal occasions by simply changing what you wear for the sequined top! Amazon made it very easy to return since I had to send it back. Linneaann

I bought this for my 93 year old Mother to wear to her Granddaughter's wedding. We bought the navy blue which was a true deep, dark blue. The shell under the jacket for perfect, it had just enough sparkle to make it elegant. The lining was soft so there was no itchy areas from all the sparkles. The jacket fit great except the arm length was a bit too long. Pants had to be hemmed too but she is 5'3" or so. She looked very sharp and felt superb for the event. We thought the value was right. It felt like a lovely chiffon, well made

I love this outfit, however, I ordered assuming that the sequins would be white. This came with different pink sequins. It’s ok but wanted white. Is there anyway I can buy the blouse with white Sequins.
Beautiful outfit but tight at bust so had to return

I am short, about 5’3” and it looked way too big on me even though it was very comfortable. It just looked very blowsy on me like the pants were really large. I returned it. If you are 5’7” or taller, you could probably handle the flow of the large legs, but it overwhelmed me.
